sj.q1: I want to make a ding in the universe.
sj.q2: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follwer
sj.q3: Design is not only what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
sj.q4: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't loose faith.

hf.q1: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
hf.q2: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
hf.q4: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
hf.q5: Whether you believe you can do a thing or not, you're right.
